answers.answer: I am not a doctor, but I think you need a cystoscopy. The urologist inserts a small camera through your urethra into the bladder to see if there is something going on. I thought it was standard to do this if the "dye test" was negative.Good luck.
thanks I am a female by the way .. but yes thathas been suggested to me that the urologist willrequest this test and thanks...

question: I have had blood showing up in urine tests for 4 years could be longerbut 4 years ago I had a bad cold and went to drs and they did a urinetest and blood showed up and then went back for a recheck for my coldand they ran the urine test again and still blood showed up... so i wasreferred to a urologist they did a dye test and saw nothing now 4 yrslater i am having to go to the bathroom very often day/night and wentto my primary dr and they had me do a blood test for diabetes and a urinetest and diabetes blood test came out fine but urine showed large amt ofblood and protein so I am again being referred to a urologist ...????
title: Urine Test shows blood and protein in urine
